faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Globridge

q1.question: How accurate is the AI translation?
q1.answer: Our AI translation engine achieves 95%+ accuracy for business content across 100+ languages, with continuous learning from your team's context.

q2.question: Can I integrate Globridge with my existing tools?
q2.answer: Yes! We integrate with popular tools like Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Workspace, Notion, and many more through our API and native integrations.

q3.question: Is my data secure?
q3.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption, comply with GDPR and SOC 2 standards, and offer on-premises deployment for Enterprise customers.

q4.question: Can I change plans anytime?
q4.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any billing adjustments.

q5.question: Do you offer custom training for large teams?
q5.answer: Yes! Enterprise customers get dedicated onboarding, custom AI training, and ongoing support to ensure maximum adoption and ROI.
